house_listing.house_description: 'Move in condition' remodeled kitchen,bath,utility rooms. Corner lot w/side loading 1.5 det. Gar. W/door opener & sec. Sys. Brick fireplace w/mantel. Beautifully landscaped yard. Eat-in kitchen & formal dining rm. Exterior motion lights. Hardwood floors under like new carpet. See supplement!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Bungalow Style, Cable TV, Fenced, Garage Door Opener,Intercom System, Storage Space, Utility Room, Workshop
